snippet: Is college always worthwhile? It is for those yearning to learn.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Mark Edmundson takes issue with the fact that the debate over who should and should not go to college is often framed in terms of economic investment; asserts that college is worthwhile for any student who is yearning to learn, regardless of the utility of the degree or the intellectual capabilities of the student.
lead_paragraph: Is college always worthwhile? It is for those yearning to learn.
